00036 class mdMandSpace {
00037     MandLayer       catalog;
00038 
00039     bool add(std::string name,md_mand typ)
00040     {if (catalog.find(name) == catalog.end()) {       
00041         mdMand *newMand    = new mdMand();
00042         catalog[name]      = *newMand;
00043         newMand->fullname  = name;        
00044         newMand->kind      = typ;
00045         newMand->handler   = NULL;
00046      }
00047 
00048     }
